item.title: Python regex basics to never forget
item.description: I have to confess that regex is a weakness this is why I am writing this post. Whenever I can I try to avoid using regex if the problem can be used in a different way, but sometimes I have to inevitably use regex. to import import re This is the only part that I usually remember :) Regex are patters represented by symbols for example pattern = 'a' test_string = 'a cat' result = re.
